title: 2025 Chilean general election - Wikipedia
snippet: Voters went to the polls to elect the 38th President of Chile, renew all 155 seats in the Chamber of Deputies, and fill 23 of the 50 seats in the Senate. Republican Party candidate José Antonio Kast defeated Communist Party member Jeannette Jara in a runoff election on 14 December...

title: Ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast elected Chile’s next president | Chile | The Guardian
snippet: The US secretary of state, Marco Rubio, on Sunday congratulated Kast, whose victory has added another right wing leader more closely aligned with Donald Trump in Latin America. Under Kast’s leadership, “we are confident Chile will advance shared priorities to include strengthening public security, ending illegal immigration, and revitalising our commercial relationship,” Rubio said in a statement.

title: Chile’s new far-right head is latest Latin American leader to ride hardline wave to power | Chile | The Guardian
snippet: Jose Antonio Kast greets a supporter after winning Chile’s presidential election in Santiago on 14 December 2025. Photograph: Reinaldo Ubilla/NurPhoto/Shutterstock ... From the US to Hungary to Argentina, rightwing leaders are praising José ...

title: MAKE CHILE GREAT AGAIN! Pro-Trump Conservative Jose Antonio Kast Wins Chile’s Presidential Election (VIDEO) | The Gateway Pundit | by Ben Kew
